Text: The attack on Saudi Arabia's Abqaiq plant, which accounts for 5 percent of global oil supplies, and a nearby facility took 5.7 million barrels a day of production off line for at least a few days.
Cause: The attack on Saudi Arabia's Abqaiq plant, which accounts for 5 percent of global oil supplies, and a nearby facility
Effect: 5.7 million barrels a day of production off line for at least a few days.
Sentence: <e1>The attack on Saudi Arabia's Abqaiq plant, which accounts for 5 percent of global oil supplies, and a nearby facility</e1> took <e2>5.7 million barrels a day of production off line for at least a few days.</e2>
